thread.title: Tom Brady offers to lace up his skates for the Bruins | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
thread.title_full: Tom Brady offers to lace up his skates for the Bruins | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian | Boston Herald

author: Chris Mason
title: Tom Brady offers to lace up his skates for the Bruins | The Blitz | with Jeff Howe & Karen Guregian
text:
Tom Brady was drafted into two professional sports, and according to a post this afternoon on Facebook, he's happy to try his hand at a third.
In honor of the Bruins season opening tonight, Brady posted a photshopped picture of himself sitting on the B's bench.
In the caption he offered to be the team's enforcer.
Good luck to the Bruins this year! Let me know if you need another enforcer out there...
Posted by Tom Brady on Thursday, October 8, 2015 If the B's are looking for a heavyweight, they might have to call Brady into action.
The 225 lb. quarterback would be the heaviest Bruin on the ice tonight, as only sidelined captain Zdeno Chara weighs more.
